channel.title: Loadbalancer on TechBlog about OpenShift/Ansible/Satellite and much more
channel.description: Recent content in Loadbalancer on TechBlog about OpenShift/Ansible/Satellite and much more

item.title: Advanced Routing Example
item.description: Welcome to part 6 of OpenShift 4 and Service Mesh Advanced routing, like Canary Deployments, traffic mirroring and loadbalancing are discussed and tested. All operations have been successdully tested on OpenShift 4.3.
